location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:71 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '28'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Bahrein (Bahrain), showing two European (probably British) men and one Arab man mounted on donkeys and standing in front of a whitewashed building. The man in the background wears a sash and sits side-saddle on his donkey. At right a group of men stand watching. Another man is partially visible at far left.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Bahrein.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘28’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Feb. 1918)’
